SELECT result.*, result.videoCount + result.articleCount contentCount FROM ( SELECT k.id, d.id videoId, d.title,
IF (k.is_special = 1, "是", "否") isSpecial, k. NAME, d.create_time createTime,
IF ( d.source_type = 0, "转载", "原创" ) sourceTypeName, d.type AS type_name, tc. NAME AS workName, k.pv_finish_time, tc.pv_limit pvLimit, k.remarks, d.url, /*-- 关联视频内容数*/ ( SELECT count(0) AS `count` FROM kf_content_video AS cv WHERE cv.did = d.id ) videoCount, /* -- 关联文章内容数*/ ( SELECT count(0) AS `count` FROM kf_content_article AS ca WHERE ca.did = d.id ) articleCount FROM kf_kpi_count AS k INNER JOIN kf_demand AS d ON d.id = k.type_id LEFT JOIN kf_demand_type AS dt ON dt.id = d.type_id LEFT JOIN kf_kpi_type_config AS tc ON k.work_type = tc.id WHERE k.uid = #{uid} AND k.type = 4 AND k.first_check_time IS NOT NULL AND k.first_check_time >= #{startDate} AND k.first_check_time < #{endDate} ) result where 1=1
AND ( result.videoId = #{title} OR result.title = #{title} )
AND result.sourceTypeName = #{sourceTypeName}

SELECT k.uid, k. NAME, workType.id workTypeId, workType.workTypeName, count(0) count FROM kf_kpi_count AS k LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ktc.id, CONCAT(ktcp. NAME, "-", ktc. NAME) workTypeName FROM kf_kpi_type_config ktc LEFT JOIN kf_kpi_type_config ktcp ON ktc.pid = ktcp.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND ktc.pid <> 0 AND ktc.is_show = 1 AND ( ktc.config_type = 100 OR ktc.config_type = 101 ) ) workType ON k.work_type = workType.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND k.type = 4 AND k.first_check_time IS NOT NULL AND k.first_check_time >= #{startDate} AND k.first_check_time < #{endDate} AND k.is_special = 0 AND workType.workTypeName IS NOT NULL GROUP BY k.uid, workType.id

SELECT ktc.id, CONCAT(ktcp. NAME,"-",ktc. NAME) workTypeName FROM kf_kpi_type_config ktc LEFT JOIN kf_kpi_type_config ktcp ON ktc.pid = ktcp.id WHERE 1 = 1 and ktc.pid <>0 AND ktc.is_show = 1 AND ( ktc.config_type = 100 OR ktc.config_type = 101 )
